pages.text: $(o)Amethyst Imbuement$() includes 30 specialized scepters that are arranged by tier in a 'tree'. Following a branch on this tree will yield an extremely powerful scepter that is customized and specialized to your liking.$(br2)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_upgrading/scepter_upgrade_tree#scepter_tree)$(bold)Jump to tree$()

Each scepter includes certain Modifiers, and some come with unique spells that aren't craftable by normal means. There are 6 paths to follow, and 6 sub-paths within each of those paths. This guide contains an overview of all the possible paths and their advantages, disadvantages, and unique provisions.
